subject: Football
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The future of the Saints and the Pelicans is at stake as their owner, Tom Benson, and his wife of 10 years battle his children, who sued to declare him mentally unfit.
snippet: The future of the Saints and the Pelicans is at stake as their owner, Tom Benson, and his wife of 10 years battle his children, who sued to declare him mentally unfit.
